attributes.action: Hold a referendum to remain/leave the E.U based on the final Brexit deal.
attributes.additional_details: It does not matter if you voted to leave or remain, the fact is that we must have a referendum on leaving or remaining in the E.U based on the final exit deal.
attributes.background:
When the public first voted in the BREXIT referendum no-one knew what effect it would have on the country economically or on peoples daily lives and there was no real information for the public to make an educated decision.
To uphold democracy the people must be able to vote on the final exit deal.

rejection.details:
We have received a large number of petitions about a second referendum on EU membership, which are very similar to petitions that are already open. We cannot accept a new petition when we already have one asking for the same thing to happen. You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition. 

You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

General petitions about a second referendum: 

To have a second referendum on Britain leaving the EU https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231461

Hold a new Brexit referendum at the next General Election if UK has not left EU https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239032

Grant a People's Vote if Parliament rejects the EU Withdrawal Agreement https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232984

Revoke Article 50 then hold a referendum on our future relationship with the EU https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245960

Petitions asking for specific questions in a second referendum:

Hold a second referendum on EU membership. (No deal not an option.) https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235138

Inclusion of No Deal Brexit be a condition for any second referendum. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245516

In further public vote on course of leaving the EU, "Remain" not an option shown https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233063

Hold a 2nd referendum (2 tier), stay or leave, if leave: Mays deal or No Deal. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241701

2nd referendum 1 - Exit the EU with No Deal 2 - Revoke article 50 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246157

Have a new referendum regards leaving the European Union. (Accept current deal / no deal / negotiate a "new softer Brexit".) https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250135

Mechanism for second Brexit Referendum that will resolve the current stalemate ("Hard Brexit" / Theresa May's deal / or remain.) https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235216

Have a referendum on whether the UK should join the EEA. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245505
